input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset

Item features:
This Hot Wheels set makes bathtime a splash
Suction cups attach the playset to the tub
Load the vehicle on the ramp and fill the cup with water
Tip the cup and watch the car go down the ramp, through the flames and into the tub
Includes playset and 1 vehicle

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset will make your kid eager for bath time, with a steep track that easily attaches to the tub with suction cups.  The child will be thrilled to watch the included car hurtle down the track through the included attached flames when they tip the water filled cup which propels the car.
input_text.Response B: The Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset brings the thrills of the track into the tub!  Suction cups attach the playset to your tub, and you can load the vehicle on the ramp and fill the cup with water to watch it go down the ramp, through the flames, and into the tub! This fun set includes the playset and one vehicle.  It's perfect for bathtime fun!
